info.author: Propertyshelf, Inc.
info.description:
==========================================
Jssor Slider Integration (ps.plone.jssor)
for propertyshelf MLS listings
==========================================

This Addon provides a configurable Viewlet for the Plone CMS, implementing the Jssor Image Gallery for a set of dynamic Listings of the propertyshelf MLS solution.
This Addon offers a configuration panel that allows to customize the resulting Gallery in nearly every aspect and should allow the max. amount of customizations through configuration.

Contributors
============



Developed by:
--------------

- Propertyshelf, Inc., development@propertyshelf.com


Changelog
=========

0.4.1 (2015-10-07)
------------------

- Nothing changed yet.


0.5 (2015-10-06)
----------------

- Nothing changed yet.


0.4 (2015-10-02)
----------------

- order FeaturedListing as defined in its configuration

0.3 (2015-07-27)
----------------

- add new data layouts for Listing Captions (Price + Bed + Bath , Property type + Bed + Bath + Price)
- update default css, remove all dark and strong colors
- set new standard setting for new Sliders
- add IE 10+ support for SliderCaptions

0.2.1 (2015-06-23)
------------------

- optimize MANIFEST.in to work with Windows OS


0.2 (2015-06-08)
----------------

- introduce extended CaptionData 


0.1.1 (2015-06-03)
------------------

- add default css to be compatbile with vanilla-theme 


0.1 (2015-06-02)
----------------

- first release
info.name: ps.plone.jssor
info.summary: Configurable Jssor Slider to show propertyshelf MLS Listings
